amendment.description: An amendment No. 3 printed in House Report 113-493 to direct the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management to include Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina and Georgia into an administrative planning area for offshore leasing purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in House Report 113-493 to direct the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management to include Virginia, North Carolina, South Carolina and Georgia into an administrative planning area for offshore leasing purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan (SC) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Duncan (SC).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duncan (SC) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
